ARABIC: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَٰلُهُمْ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْءَاخِرَةِ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for those who reject Allah's Signs, and kill the Prophets without any right to do so, and kill those who command justice, give them news of a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Their good deeds will be wasted in this world and in the next, and none will they have to help them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: These are the people whose works have gone to waste in this world and in the World to Come. They have none to help them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The deeds of such people are made devoid of all virtue in both this life and the life to come. There will be no one to help them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They are those whose deeds are wasted in this world and in the Hereafter; and they do not have any aides.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They are those whose works will be lost in this world and in the Hereafter, and they will have no helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Those are they whose works shall become null in this world as well as the hereafter, and they shall have no helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: their works have failed in this world and the next; they have no helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Those are they whose works have failed in the world and the Hereafter; and they have no helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: their deeds will come to nothing in this world as well as in the hereafter; they will have no supporters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: These are they whose works have Come to naught in the world and the Hereafter, nor have they helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They are the ones whose works have failed in this world and the Hereafter, and they will have no helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They are those whose works will bear no fruit in this world and in the Hereafter nor will they have anyone to help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They are those whose works will be lost in this world and in the Hereafter, and they will have no helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Their works shall be annulled in this world and in the Everlasting Life, and there shall be none to help them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They are those whose deeds will come to nothing, in this world and in the Hereafter; and they will have no saviors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They are the ones whose deeds have become worthless in this world and the Hereafter, and for them there will be no helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:22] Those are the ones whose works, what good they did in the way of charity and kindness to kin, have failed, [whose works] are invalid, in this world and the Hereafter, and so they have nothing to reckon with, since these [works] are of no consequence; they have no helpers, [no] protectors from the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Those are they whose works) good deeds (have failed) made void (in the world and the Hereafter) that is, they will not be given reward for them in the Hereafter; (and they have no helpers) who will save them from Allah's punishment.
